metadata.title: CVE-2017-13135 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A NULL Pointer Dereference exists in VideoLAN x265, as used in libbpg 0.9.7and other products, because the CUData::initialize function incommon/cudata.cpp mishandles memory-allocation failure.

criterions.comment: x265: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
